skillTree.name: Spite
skillTree.description: Larger than most others of its kind, the ferocious Cold One named 'Spite' is truly a creature fit for a heartless murderer like Malus Darkblade.

skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.name: Beast Tamer
skillTree.description: The honing of a Druchii's affinity with animals assures that the bestial ranks heed his imperious command with obedience.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Charge bonus: +15 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.

skillTree.name: TYRANT OF HAG GRAEF
skillTree.description: I am Malus! Malus Darkblade! Kill me if you dare! Kill me if you can! (Malus campaign only skill)

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% for Malus and Tz'arkan
Casualty replenishment rate: +25% for Cold One Knights, Dread Knights and Cold One Chariots units

skillTree.name: The Waking
skillTree.description: Each sip of the elixir is a harsh reminder of what he has become.

skillTree.name: Pain Tolerance
skillTree.description: Malus does not bleed, nor feel pain. Such expressions of the flesh have long since fallen away.

skillTree.name: Lying in Wait
skillTree.description: Every moment of silence is but a slaughter yet begun.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.name: The Slumber
skillTree.description: “If nothing else, Malus Darkblade, you can be counted on to react to adversity with as much violence as is physically possible."

skillTree.name: Avatar of Terror
skillTree.description: He is unnatural; an aberrant of the darkest kind. To lay eyes upon him in battle stirs a primal fear in the hearts of men and Elves alike.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Tissue
skillTree.description: Wounds of the body can be unmade, for they are immaterial and insignificant.

skillTree.name: Cold Heart
skillTree.description: "The Lord of Ruin is coming for you. Onwards, beast of the deep earth!"

effects.description: Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.name: Drachau Tyrant
skillTree.description: Sleepless nights afford the Lord of Hag Graef time to viciously and efficiently tackle tedious matters. Like taxes, always taxes...

effects.description: On turn start, Lords in this character's region have a chance to gain 1 loyalty

skillTree.name: Contempt & Hatred
skillTree.description: "With hate, all things are possible."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against anything and everything

skillTree.name: Sea Dragon Cloak
skillTree.description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Line Breaker
skillTree.description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee attack: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee attack: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee defence: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units

skillTree.name: Sheafmaster
skillTree.description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +12% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +7% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +20% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units

skillTree.name: Raid Leader
skillTree.description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +5 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Missile strength: +5% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Melee defence: +4 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Charge bonus: +10 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Missile strength: +10% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Melee defence: +6 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Charge bonus: +20 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units

skillTree.name: Lash Master
skillTree.description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +5% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Charge bonus: +10 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +5% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +10% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Charge bonus: +20 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Knight Lord
skillTree.description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee defence: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee attack: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee defence: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.name: Slaughterlord
skillTree.description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee defence: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee attack: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee defence: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units

skillTree.name: Cull the Unworthy
skillTree.description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +10% for Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ravager Rewards
skillTree.description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

effects.description: Speed: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Range: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Favour the Fortunate
skillTree.description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +5 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Confer Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +15% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Dreaded Slaver
skillTree.description: This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Infamous Raider
skillTree.description: If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Fleeting Shadow
skillTree.description: Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Scion of the Dark Crag
skillTree.description: Hag Graef’s greatest tyrant is legendary in Naggaroth; an exceptional warrior and feared leader whose hatred can drive him to overcome any opposition.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -25% for Cold One Dread Knights, Cold One Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Upkeep: -25% for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

items.name: The Warpsword of Khaine
items.description: "The Time of Blood is at hand!"

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
